TSamplerTraverser Class Reference

This class iterates over the intermediate tree and sets untyped sampler symbols to have types based on the type of texture operation the samplers are used for. More...

std::string currentFunction

Detailed Description

This class iterates over the intermediate tree and sets untyped sampler symbols to have types based on the type of texture operation the samplers are used for.

TSamplerTraverser
